Influx._comment_bucket: Bucket where power data will be stored
Influx._comment_token: InfluxDB API token with write access to the bucket

_comment_interval: How often to collect data from devices (in seconds, recommended: 10-60)
_comment_refresh: How often to refresh the cloud device list (in minutes, recommended: 10-30)
_comment_logpath: Path to the log file (relative or absolute)
_comment_local: Array of local network Shelly devices

LocalDevices._comment: Example: Shelly EM in the kitchen
LocalDevices.Name: Kitchen_EM

_comment_cloud: Shelly Cloud API settings for cloud-connected devices

ShellyCloud._comment_enabled: Set to false to disable cloud device collection
ShellyCloud._comment_server: Shelly Cloud API server URL (depends on your region)
ShellyCloud._comment_regions: EU: shelly-001-eu.shelly.cloud, US: shelly-001-us.shelly.cloud, Asia: shelly-001-as.shelly.cloud
ShellyCloud._comment_token: Shelly Cloud API v2 Bearer token (get from https://control.shelly.cloud settings)
